history.proof: intros t. scongruence use: LNT2LNT_term, LNN2LNT_freeVarTerm.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P.
In environment t : Term Unable to unify "freeVarTerm LNT t" with "freeVarTerm LNN (LNT2LNN_term t)".
